summary: Commercial patients have a 72% CDK4/6i utilization rate, while Medicare patients lag at 38%. Closing the Medicare gap could yield $120,000/year.

peer_comparison.description: Top-performing oncology practices achieve 68% Medicare CDK4/6i utilization through streamlined authorization processes and patient support. Your Medicare rate of 38% is 30% below these leaders. Closing this gap could yield $168,750/year.
action_steps: Implement peer-developed Medicare authorization toolkit for CDK4/6i
Establish patient financial navigator program for Medicare patients
Create Medicare Advantage plan-specific pathways based on peer best practices
Develop standardized Medicare patient communication protocol
Identify Medicare patients eligible for CDK4/6i
Connect Medicare patients to financial assistance programs
Review payer-specific barriers with care team
suggestions: Negotiate with Medicare Advantage plans for better coverage
